question: What is a 10-Day Free Look Period?
text:
What is a 10-Day Free Look Period?  
          
        
A free look period is a required period of time under state and federal law in which a customer can terminate coverage without penalties or charges following the start of coverage. If a customer is not satisfied with the terms and conditions of their policy they have purchased they can terminate the policy within 10 days of the coverage start date and any premiums paid will be refunded.

Also See:

How do I cancel my plan through Pennie?
I selected a plan on Pennie. I have just received and read the policys terms and dont want the policy anymore. How do I cancel/terminate?
